title: Sum of Array
description: Given an array of N integers, find their sum.
input: First line contains integer N. Second line contains N integers separated by space.
output: Output the sum of given N integers.

title: Reverse Array
description: Given an array of N integers, print the array in reverse order.
input: First line contains integer N. Second line contains N integers.
output: Print the numbers in reverse order separated by space.
